GapFillDropdown.Title: The definite article (the)
GapFillDropdown.ContentGapFillDropdown:
1. Daisy isthe - most beautiful girl in the world.
2. This is the - book I told you about.
3. The - tigers are dangerous.
4. The - school where I studied was excellent.
5. I'm the - best swimmer in my class.
6. The - milk is good for your teeth.
7. The - book I read last week is called Beloved.
8. This is the - problem we were talking about.
9. The - money isn't the most important thing in life.
10. She has two dresses. The - blue one is very pretty.
